#include<iostream>
long gcd(long m,long n)
{
  if(n==0)
    return m;
  else
    return gcd(n,m%n);
    
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  int val=t;
  long x[5],y[5];
  long A,m,n,r,m1,n1;
  while(t--)
  {
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
      cin>>x[i]>>y[i];
    }
    x[4]=x[0];
    y[4]=y[0];
    A=0;
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
      A+=x[i]*y[i+1]-x[i+1]*y[i];
    }
    A=A/2;
    if(A<0)
      A=-A;
    //cout<<"\narea="<<A<<endl;
    long count=0;
    for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
    {
    m1=(y[i]-y[i+1]);
    if(m1<0)
      m1=-m1;
    n1=(x[i]-x[i+1]);
    if(n1<0)
      n1=-n1;
    r=gcd(m1,n1);
    count+=r+1;
    //cout<<"count="<<count<<endl;
    }
    count=count-4;
    cout<<"Case "<<val-t<<": "<<A-count/2+1+count<<endl;
  }
}
